document.docAuthor: Laranjeira, Vanessa Cristina, Gonçalves, Clayton Corrêa, Domahovski, Alexandre Cruz & Takiya, Daniela Maeda
document.docTitle: Proxima nigromaculata Laranjeira & Gonçalves & Domahovski & Takiya 2022, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Review of Proxima DeLong & Freytag (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Gyponini) with description of two new species from Brazil and identification key to species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of Proxima DeLong & Freytag (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Gyponini) with description of two new species from Brazil and identification key to species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Laboratório de Entomologia, Departamento de Zoologia, Instituto de Biologia, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro.

subSubSection.paragraph: Coloration. Color pattern as in generic description, except for two dark brown maculae on corium of the forewing, one at the base of the first apical cell and appendix, and the other at wing apex ( Figs 16 , 54, 55 ).
External morphology. Forewing ( Fig. 16 ) with or without few extra-numerary veins on apical half, frequently on subapical cells. Other characters as in generic description.
Etymology. The species epithet refers to the black maculae on the forewing.
